title: Too much Lagg
body: I am have too much lagg and dont know what to do. 200-400 ping each game and spikes randomly. My internet speed is fine. pls helpp

replies.body: Your internet being fine doesn't make you immune from problems reaching specific servers. :/   In this case, it sounds like you have some major packet loss while communicated with the game server, which can result in these high ping spikes.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get a better idea of your specific issue.  Let me know what the results are, and we can go from there.
